definition: fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)

sentences.english: The two women leaned upon the wrought-iron window rail in the shadow of the curtains.
sentences.chinese: 两个女人在窗帘的遮掩下，把胳膊肘支在铁栏杆上。

sentences.english: The albino drew a pistol from his coat and aimed the barrel through the bars, directly at the curator.
sentences.chinese: 他从外套中拔出手枪，将枪管透过铁栏杆瞄准了馆长。

sentences.english: He fell out of the window and was impaled on the iron railings.
sentences.chinese: 他从窗口跌下去，身体被铁栏杆刺穿了。

sentences.english: Iron and iron baluster between, only can hold the monkey arm outstretched.
sentences.chinese: 铁栏杆与铁栏杆之间，仅能容得下猴子的手臂伸出来。

sentences.english: Iron and iron baluster between, only can hold the monkey arm outstretched.
sentences.chinese: 铁栏杆与铁栏杆之间，仅能容得下猴子的手臂伸出来。

sentences.english: Have you the key to the gate, Thenardier?
sentences.chinese: 你带了铁栏门的钥匙吧，德纳第？

sentences.english: Heavy iron chains around his feet and hands were fixed to a metal bar that ran round the hall about ten centimetres off the ground.
sentences.chinese: 铐着他的脚和手的沉重的镣铐被固定在一条铁栏杆上。

sentences.english: They have taken down the iron railings on this side of the park.
sentences.chinese: 他们把公园这边的铁栏杆拆下来了。

sentences.english: The anthem that the organist played cemented Soapy to the iron fence.
sentences.chinese: 风琴师弹奏的赞美诗音乐把苏贝胶在铁栏杆上了。

sentences.english: The windows had iron bars on them leaving only one door to escape the inferno.
sentences.chinese: 窗户上装着铁栏杆，只留下一道门让人逃离这座地狱。

sentences.english: When he approached the grating he forgot everything.
sentences.chinese: 当他走近那铁栏门时，什么都忘了。

sentences.english: She saw him displace the bar and slip into the garden.
sentences.chinese: 她看见他挪开铁栏门上的铁条，钻到园子里去。

sentences.english: Then my focus changes and beyond that green iron wall of plus signs -- just across the lane -- I see a jaunty woman wearing a cliché of lingerie.
sentences.chinese: 然后我的注意力转向了绿色铁栏的那一边。

sentences.english: She lives in a garden with an iron fence, in the Rue Plumet.
sentences.chinese: 她住在一个花园里，有一道铁栏门，卜吕梅街。
一道对着花园的铁栏门。

sentences.english: He felt the hardness of the iron railing press against his spine .
sentences.chinese: 他感觉到硬邦邦的铁栏杆顶着自己的脊梁。

definition: variant of 門閂|门闩[men2 shuan1]
door knocker (in the shape of a ring)
